briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

briefdescription.para: This is the BLE data receive callback function.

detaileddescription.para: Callback function called on data reception over BLE.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to the received data buffer

simplesect.para: Do not perform any heavy processing within this function and return ASAP.

parameterdescription.para: : Buffer in which received data to be stored.

briefdescription.para: This will send start or stop message based on input parameter.

parameterdescription.para: Differentiates start and stop command. APP_CONTROLLER_BLE_START_PAYLOAD for start. APP_CONTROLLER_BLE_END_PAYLOAD for stop.
